audioText: Les nouveaux cours de natation pour adultes commencent lundi prochain à la piscine municipale.
question: When do the new adult swimming classes start?
options: Next Monday at the municipal pool
This weekend at the sports center
explanation: The text states 'Les nouveaux cours de natation pour adultes commencent lundi prochain à la piscine municipale' - The new adult swimming classes start next Monday at the municipal pool. 'Natation' means swimming and 'piscine municipale' means municipal pool.
